verses.verse: <S%H6258>"Now<s%> <S%H1413>muster<s%> yourselves in <S%H1413>troops,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1416>troops;<s%> They have <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H4692>siege<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us; With a <S%H7626>rod<s%> they will <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H8199>judge<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> on the <S%H3895>cheek.<s%>

"But as for you, <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> <S%H672>Ephrathah,<s%> [Too] <S%H6810>little<s%> to be among the <S%H505>clans<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> From you One will <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> for Me to be <S%H4910>ruler<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> His <S%H4163>goings<s%> <S%H4163>forth<s%> are from <S%H6924>long<s%> <S%H6924>ago,<s%> From the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>eternity.<s%>"

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> He will <S%H5414>give<s%> them [up] <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> When she who is in <S%H3205>labor<s%> has <S%H3205>borne<s%> a child. Then the <S%H3499>remainder<s%> of His <S%H251>brethren<s%> Will <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And He will <S%H5975>arise<s%> and <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> [His flock] In the <S%H5797>strength<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> In the <S%H1347>majesty<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> His <S%H430>God.<s%> And they will <S%H3427>remain,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> at that <S%H6258>time<s%> He will be <S%H1431>great<s%> To the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2088>One<s%> will be [our] <S%H7965>peace.<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> <S%H935>invades<s%> our <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> he <S%H1869>tramples<s%> on our <S%H759>citadels,<s%> Then we will <S%H6965>raise<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him <S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H5257>leaders<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

And they will <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> The <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5248>Nimrod<s%> at its <S%H6607>entrances;<s%> And He will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> [us] from the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> he <S%H935>attacks<s%> our <S%H776>land<s%> And <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H1869>tramples<s%> our <S%H1366>territory.<s%>

Then the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> Will be <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> Like <S%H2919>dew<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Like <S%H7241>showers<s%> on <S%H6212>vegetation<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> do not <S%H6960>wait<s%> for <S%H376>man<s%> Or <S%H3176>delay<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

And the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> Will be among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H7130>Among<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> Like a <S%H9030>lion<s%> among the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H9194>forest,<s%> Like a <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> among <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> <S%H834>Which,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H5674>passes<s%> <S%H5674>through,<s%> <S%H7429>Tramples<s%> <S%H7429>down<s%> and <S%H2963>tears,<s%> And <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5337>rescue.<s%>
Your <S%H3027>hand<s%> will be <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H340>enemies<s%> will be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off.<s%>

"And it will be in that <S%H3117>day,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "That I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> your <S%H5483>horses<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you And destroy your <S%H6>chariots.<s%>
"I will also <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%> And <S%H2040>tear<s%> <S%H2040>down<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4013>fortifications.<s%>
"I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H3785>sorceries<s%> from your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> And you will <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H6049>fortunetellers<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> more.

"I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> your <S%H6456>carved<s%> <S%H6456>images<s%> And your [sacred] <S%H4676>pillars<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you, So that you will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> To the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
"I will <S%H5428>root<s%> out your <S%H842>Asherim<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you And <S%H8045>destroy<s%> your <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
"And I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H2534>wrath<s%> On the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have not <S%H8085>obeyed.<s%>"
